https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vS6ne76vjRH7Z88rAqYLCcQatB4.jpg A psychological, heart-wrenching love story that provides a unique and inside look at Charles Darwin. Torn between faith and science, he struggles to finish his legendary book "On the Origin of the Species," which goes on to become the foundation for evolutionary biology. Creation
